trans-unit.source: Generates views for the extents in the <xref href="System.Data.Mapping.StorageMappingItemCollection"></xref>, and creates a source code file for a type that will cache these views.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityViewGenerator"></xref> class with a <xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.LanguageOption.GenerateCSharpCode"></xref> language option.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityViewGenerator"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.LanguageOption"></xref>.
One of the <xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.LanguageOption"></xref> values that specifies the language of the generated code.
The default language is C#.
Generates views at compile time for the extents in a <xref href="System.Data.Mapping.StorageMappingItemCollection"></xref>.
Sends a source code file to a <xref href="System.IO.TextWriter"></xref> to make these views available at run time.
The <xref href="System.Data.Mapping.StorageMappingItemCollection"></xref> from which views will be generated.
The <xref href="System.IO.TextWriter"></xref> to which the generated code will be sent.
A list that contains any generated errors.
Generates views at compile time for the extents in a <xref href="System.Data.Mapping.StorageMappingItemCollection"></xref>.
Writes a source code file to a specified location that makes the views available at run time.
The <xref href="System.Data.Mapping.StorageMappingItemCollection"></xref> from which views will be generated.
The <xref href="System.String"></xref> that specifies the location to which the source code file will be written.
A list that contains any generated errors.
Generates views at compile time for the extents in a <xref href="System.Data.Mapping.StorageMappingItemCollection"></xref>.
Sends a source code file to a <xref href="System.IO.TextWriter"></xref> to make these views available at run time.
The <xref href="System.Data.Mapping.StorageMappingItemCollection"></xref> to be validated.
The <xref href="System.IO.TextWriter"></xref> to which the output is written.
The property of <xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityFrameworkVersions"></xref> that corresponds to the targeted version of the Entity Framework.
A list that contains any generated errors.
Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.LanguageOption"></xref> value that indicates the language of the generated code.
One of the <xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.LanguageOption"></xref> values.
The default is <xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.LanguageOption.GenerateCSharpCode"></xref>.
Validates a <xref href="System.Data.Mapping.StorageMappingItemCollection"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Data.Mapping.StorageMappingItemCollection"></xref> to be validated.
A list that contains any generated errors.
Validates a <xref href="System.Data.Mapping.StorageMappingItemCollection"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Data.Mapping.StorageMappingItemCollection"></xref> to be validated.
The property of <xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityFrameworkVersions"></xref> that corresponds to the targeted version of the Entity Framework.
A list that contains any validation errors.
